text: Yesli blagodarya kakomu-libo pisaniyu peremeshchalis' by gory, razverzlas' by zemlya ili zagovorili by pokoyniki [, to eto byl by tol'ko Koran]. No vsevlastno povelevayet tol'ko Allakh. Razve ne znayut te, kotoryye uverovali, chto yesli by Allakh zakhotel, to napravil by vsekh lyudey na pryamoy put'? Bedstviya budut neprestanno porazhat' tekh, kto ne uveroval, ili budut ryadom s ikh zhilishchami do tekh por, poka ne ispolnitsya to, chem uveshcheval Allakh. Voistinu, Allakh soblyudayet obeshchaniya
